long_description: Whether you're out in snow flurries or a full-on blizzard, the waterproof, insulated Burton Ginger jacket protects you from the elements while adding a stylish look to your winter getup. DRYRIDE Durashell(TM) two-layer coated nylon shell with critically taped seams provides windproof, waterproof and breathable protection from the elements. 60g 3M(TM) Thinsulate(TM) insulation in the body and 40g in the sleeves is placed strategically to retain warmth and keep you comfortable on cold days. Breathable taffeta lining keeps warmth inside and wicks away moisture. Contoured, adjustable fleece hood fits the shape of your head, providing good warmth without obstructing vision; removable faux fur trim adds appeal. Removable waist gaiter with jacket-to-pants interface creates a barrier against snow entry with compatible Burton pants (sold separately). Includes zippered hand pockets, internal stash pockets and an internal goggles/media pocket; flash pass pocket ensures your ticket is readily accessible in the lift line. The Burton Ginger jacket is built for layering without being overly baggy; sleeves are designed with a bit of extra length to fit over your gloves and keep snow out.
short_description: Whether you're out in snow flurries or a full-on blizzard, the waterproof, insulated Burton Ginger jacket protects you from the elements while adding a stylish look to your winter getup.
